name.title: View name
name.description: Human readable name which can be referenced by the user

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: If multiple matches are found, the view with the lowest number will be used

fragments.title: Required fragments
fragments.description: The command will is run when the alias is used. The command can reference positional arguments using $1, $2 etc.

type.title: Match by type
type.description: Match view by the given .type value

contentType.title: Match by Content-Type header value
contentType.description: Match against the response's Content-Type header. Accepts regex

self.title: Match by .self value
self.description: Match against the response's .self property. Accepts regex

columns.title: Columns to be displayed when the view is used
columns.description: List of columns which will be used in the view. These can use the same syntax as the --select flag

version.title: Extension version
version.description: Extension version. Reserved for future use

aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.description: Custom aliases which are included in the extension
